title: Peaceful XL 1 Bedroom w/ Bricked in Yard
posting_body: ['**AVAILABLE NOW!!!', '**', '1 of 3 furnished Bedrooms for Rent in 4BD House (Ask about Master BR with Private Bath $1085)', '1 private furnished bedroom available for immediate occupancy', '$950/month', 'No Security Deposit', 'No Credit Check', 'No App Fee', 'Utilities paid separately and is the tenants responsibility split the bill b/t roommates.', '(You will receive total amount ledger via text monthly)', '(Small, quiet pets welcome with additional deposit of $300)', 'Laid back, responsible roommates.', 'Must be able to verify employment; no credit check required.', 'Couples Welcomed - $1220/month', '**IMMEDIATE OCCUPANCY!!', '—1 private bdrm for Rent in 4 Bdrm House - furnished!', 'Washer/Dryer In Unit', 'No Application Fee - Rent due on the 1st of every month Utilities paid separately and is tenants responsibility split b/t roommates.', 'Small, quiet pets welcome with additional deposit of $300']
